result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) and OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs). The defendant was found guilty of Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) and the other charge, OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) was dismissed by the court.

  • Troy A. Zabel was found guilty of Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant may serve probation/jail in Clark County
Any vehicles T&R in defendants name are ordered to have IID as is defendant himself.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

DNA sample.  Defendant must be in full compliance with driver's safety plan.

timeConds.notes: with huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy A. Zabel

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Case called: 9:05am
State appears by ADA S.Brubacher.  Def appears in person and with Atty John Stichert.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VR not applicable.

State moves to:
Ct. 1 (OWI 4th)>>DISMISS
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
Ct. 2 (PAC 4th)>>NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 2 years Probation
CONDITIONS: $2009 inclusive; DNA sample and surcharge; 6 months MCJ w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system, with credit for 1 day of time already served, to begin at discretion of PO, but within 45 days; 36 months DL Rev with credit; Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name are ordered to have IID installed and IID is ordered on defendant himself, both for a period of 24 months; IID to be installed within 14 days; $50 IID surcharge to be paid; AODA and any other assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; Absolute sobriety; Defendant must be in full compliance with driver's safety plan, IID order and DL rev order as conditions of probation.

>>Defendant may serve probation and jail in CLARK County
